parties.name: SANTA CRUZ COUNTY REGIONAL TRANSPORTATION COMMISSION
parties.capacity: Principal address at 1523 Pacific Ave, Santa Cruz, CA 95060

offerAndAcceptance.offer: Engagement of Consultant for professional services.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties acknowledge a mutual meeting of the minds.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties hereby express their intention to create a legally binding agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The services provided under this Agreement are lawful and comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Consultant shall provide specified services as outlined in Exhibit A: Scope of Services.
certaintyOfTerms.price: The compensation shall not exceed $_____ as specified in Exhibit B: Fee Schedule.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: This Agreement shall take effect upon approval by the Commission and shall remain in force for the agreed duration.

contract.consent: The Consultant shall not remove key personnel assigned to this Agreement without the prior consent of the Commission.

durationAndTermination.duration: This Agreement shall commence upon execution and shall terminate on the specified date unless amended.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: The Commission reserves the right to terminate this Agreement for convenience or on the grounds of default, subject to appropriate notice.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Any renewal of this Agreement shall require mutual agreement of both parties.

signatures.declaration: Authorized to execute on behalf of Consultant.

signatures.partyName: SANTA CRUZ COUNTY REGIONAL TRANSPORTATION COMMISSION
signatures.declaration: Authorized to execute on behalf of the Commission.
